Posts.Content: I got mine too, Thank you so much.. It made me feel good to be thought of.... Angie
Posts.Title: Chen~You Cheated!!

Posts.Content: I just mailed mine yesterday---My secret sister should have it by next week...
Posts.Title: Ornament mailed (sorry it took so long!)

Posts.Content: I actually had my wig before I started chemo.. A nurse advised me to do that, so they could match the color. When it did start coming out, I first had it cut short, then had it buzzed off. That was the best thing for me to do because I was working and it was coming off a little at a time... It actually looked better than my own hair... Angie
Posts.Title: need advice on hair loss preparation

Posts.Content: Congrats to you..It's three years for me too... I diagnosed on Feb.5th and started chemo on the 27th... It was long 3 years, but so far it's been good... Angie
Posts.Title: Sunday (27th) 3 yrs since

Posts.Content: Congrats to you..It's three years for me too... I diagnosed on Feb.5th and started chemo on the 27th... It was long 3 years, but so far it's been good... Angie
Posts.Title: Sunday (27th) 3 yrs since

Posts.Content: Sorry for the double post...don't know what happened Angie
Posts.Title: Sunday (27th) 3 yrs since

Posts.Content: I had chemo first, adramyasin and cytoxin (sorry about the spelling) then Taxol with Herceptin. Finished chemo started with Arimidex then had surgery followed by radiation and the rest of Herceptin. After Arimidex, switched to Femara and now on Aromisin... Side effects with them all. Angie
Posts.Title: Aromasin after Chemo and Radiation

Posts.Content: HI.. I didn't even realize I lost my eye lashes until I really looked..I think I missed my eyebrows more. But I wear glasses, so they hid that and the bangs on my wig hid the fact that I had no eyebrows...buy they came back along with all the other hairs.... Angie
Posts.Title: Eyelashes

Posts.Content: Depending on what season it is... bright colors in the spring and summer- darker colors in the fall and winter. But always pink.... Angie
Posts.Title: I thought it would be great to see what your favorite color is, so, what is your favorite color?
